definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: The company's products have no shoddy, low charge high.
sentences.chinese: 本公司產品絕無以次充好，以低充高。

sentences.english: The concert is going to begin, the audience are waiting to enter with their tickets.
sentences.chinese: 演唱會就要開始了，觀衆們拿着票在等待以次入場。

sentences.english: Then, in building materials, buildings, the construction of shoddy work.
sentences.chinese: 然後，在建築材料上以次充好，施工上偷工減料。

sentences.english: The folks take the phoenix as the symbol of auspiciousness and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 民間即以次象徵吉祥和喜慶來歌頌幸福的生活。

sentences.english: The host filled the guests' glasses in turn.

definition: high position/eminent status/top job/raised position/upper (limbs)/a high (i.e. local maximum)/high point on scale, high grade, temperature, latitude etc
to publish class list of successful exam candidates
to remove or lighten (a tax etc)
